name: Frigate NVR
short_desc: AI-powered network video recorder with object detection
author: Blake Blackshear
description: Frigate is an open source NVR built around real-time AI object detection. It uses OpenCV and Tensorflow to perform real-time object detection locally on live camera feeds.

form_fields.label: RTSP Password
form_fields.hint: Password for RTSP camera feeds authentication

form_fields.label: Media folder
form_fields.hint: Frigate keeps video, snapshots in this directory
